Title: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF ONE HUNDRED AND FORTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE STEAMSHIP TABLAS BY THE BUREAU OF COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY.
Data:
[ Act No. 2914, March 23, 1920 ]
AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF ONE HUNDRED AND FORTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE STEAMSHIP TABLAS BY THE BUREAU OF COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY.
Whereas the management of the steamship Tablas has been transferred to the Bureau of Commerce and Industry; and
Whereas the sum set aside in the General Appropriation Act for the operation and maintenance of the vessels of the Bureau of Commerce and Industry does not include the amount necessary for the operation and maintenance of the steamship Tablas: Now, therefore,
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The following appropriations are hereby made, to be added to those made for the Bureau of Commerce and Industry by sections 1-QQ-100, 101, 102, 103, 126, and 129 of Act Numbered Twenty-eight hundred and seventy-five, for the operation and maintenance of the steamship Tablas:

SALARIES AND WAGES.
Officers, at rates and subject to conditions to be fixed by agreement between the Secretaries of the Interior, Finance, and Commerce and Communications, in proportion to those granted by private shipowners for similar services . .. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . P12,880.00
Petty officers and crew, at rates and subject to conditions to be fixed by agreement between the Secretaries of the Interior, Finance, and Commerce and Communications, in proportion to those granted by private shipowners for similar services . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 14, 190.00
Clothing allowance to crew . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .1,030,00
Subsistence of officers, petty officers, and crew, at rates and subject to conditions to be fixed by agreement between the Secretaries of the Interior, Finance, and Commerce and Communications, in proportion to those granted by private shipowners for similar services . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 13,850,00
Total for salaries and wages . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .41,950.00
MISCELLANEOUS EXPENSES.
Consumption of supplies and materials . . . . . , P68,050.00
Maintenance and repair of equipment . . . . . . . . . 30,000.00
Total for miscellaneous expenses . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 98,050.00
RECAPITULATION.
Total for salaries and wages . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 41,950.00
Total for miscellaneous expenses . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 98,050.00
Total of additional appropriations for the Bureau of Commerce and Industry . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .140,000.00
Provided,That in the discretion of the Secretary of Commerce and Communications, the steamship Tablas may be used by the Bureau of Labor, without any expense to the latter, for its activities in connection with inter-island migration.

Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.ℒαwρhi৷
